Uses of Interface
org.dyn4j.Listener

  • Packages that use Listener 
    Package Description
    org.dyn4j.collision
    Package containing classes to detect collisions between Convex Shapes.
    org.dyn4j.dynamics
    Package containing the dynamics engine.
    org.dyn4j.dynamics.contact
    Sub package of the Dynamics package handling contacts.

    • Uses of Listener in org.dyn4j.collision

      Subinterfaces of Listener in org.dyn4j.collision 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BoundsListener
      Represents an object that is notified when a Collidable goes out of Bounds.
      Classes in org.dyn4j.collision that implement Listener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoundsAdapter
      Convenience class for implementing the BoundsListener interface.

    • Uses of Listener in org.dyn4j.dynamics

      Subinterfaces of Listener in org.dyn4j.dynamics 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CollisionListener
      Interface to listen for collision events.
      interface  ConvexCastListener
      Interface to listen for convex cast events.
      interface  DestructionListener
      Listens for implicit destruction events.
      interface  RaycastListener
      Interface for listening for raycast events.
      interface  StepListener
      Listener notified before and after a simulation step by the World.
      interface  TimeOfImpactListener
      Interface to listen for time of impact events.
      Classes in org.dyn4j.dynamics that implement Listener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CollisionAdapter
      Convenience class for implementing the CollisionListener interface.
      class  ConvexCastAdapter
      Default implemenation of the ConvexCastListener interface.
      class  DestructionAdapter
      Convience class for implementing the DestructionListener interface.
      class  RaycastAdapter
      Default implementation of the RaycastListener interface.
      class  StepAdapter
      Convience class for implementing the StepListener interface.
      class  TimeOfImpactAdapter
      Convenience class for implementing the TimeOfImpactListener interface.
      Fields in org.dyn4j.dynamics with type parameters of type Listener 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<Listener> World.listeners
      The list of listeners for this world
      Methods in org.dyn4j.dynamics with type parameters of type Listener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Listener> 
      int      		 World.getListenerCount(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
      Returns the total number of listeners of the given type attached to this world.
      <T extends Listener> 
      java.util.List<T>      		 World.getListeners(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
      Returns the listeners that are of the given type or sub types of the given type.
      <T extends Listener> 
      void      		 World.getListeners(java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.util.List<T> listeners)
      Returns the listeners of the given type (or sub types) in the given list.
      <T extends Listener> 
      int      		 World.removeAllListeners(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
      Removes all the listeners of the specified type.
      Methods in org.dyn4j.dynamics with parameters of type Listener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void World.addListener(Listener listener)
      Adds the given listener to the list of listeners.
      boolean World.containsListener(Listener listener)
      Returns true if the given listener is already attached to this world.
      boolean World.removeListener(Listener listener)
      Removes the given listener.
